availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer. Pennsylvania native. Married to Jacintha Eglantine Davis. Father of Thomas McElfresh, John McElfresh, Gelina McElfresh, Marion McElfresh, Nathan McElfresh, Sally A. McElfresh, Josephina McElfresh, Elmer McElfresh, and Lorance McElfresh. Farmer in Bracken County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, 438B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District 1, p. 180.
Kentucky, Death Records, 1852-1965, Film #7020637, Bracken County, May 28, 1942 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
